channel.title: Question about Moparscape site
channel.description:
Well I can't seem to find a suggestion section.
So I'm going to ask this in a question :P
1.) Why can't we allow people to see how many posts we have posted? (this would be a nice feature for the site)
2.) Why does our Rep++ have to limit to 200, why not infinite or 10,000 or something high like that?
Thanks. :o

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Meh this may be pointless but once mitb Has made his point i don’t think he will change his mind so i Wouldnt bother Posting because this will be locked i’m asuming.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Kaex, post:14, topic:377337”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=473239.msg3463922#msg3463922 date=1294755153]

I think if you’ve been here for more then a year or 3, you should be able to have an avatar. Or some requirements would be some rewards of being a long term and active member, kinda dull when everyone here is the same and there no uniqueness. Ya know what i’m sayin’?

Ah its ok, but I want to ask 1 last question, rep why can’t it just be 1 by 1, people with 200 when they rep it does 13?

Sorry for noob questions but I just wounder these things lol.

rep can’t be 1 by 1 because of the mod. It would be cool if it was 1 by 1 because then it would take 200 rep++ to gain 200 which would be decently hard to do…

Exactly my point, theres noobs with 200 rep++?

A cycle of idiots feeding other idiots ego points
[/quote]

Exactly, therefor why can’t it be made like EXTREMELY hard to get 200 lol.[/quote]

That wouldn’t make it hard to get rep. Long ago, it was 1 rep for 1 rep++, and it was even more out of control than it is now.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

What would be nice is if only Staff, Moderators, Veterans, and Community Members where the only ones who could distribute reputation.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:377380”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=473239.msg3461083#msg3461083 date=1294485425]
People pretty much answered your questions, but I’ll go ahead and do it too:

  1. We don’t care about post count here, and believe it doesn’t matter. If you really want to see your post count, you can do so on your profile.
  2. We also don’t believe rep means all that much. Plus the system is set up in such a way that you give 1 rep point for every 15 points you have yourself, this means that, with a cap of 200, the most anyone can give is 13 points, which is a lot. If the cap is removed it would be possible for someone with thousands of rep to give someone else hundreds in just one click. So it would mean even less than it does now.
  3. Avatars and signatures make the forum look messy and childish, and are also a nightmare when it comes to moderation. We just don’t like them here.

What we DO think means a lot here is the quality (not quantity) of your posts, and how helpful you are to others. In fact, those are about the only things that matter.
[/quote]

Why cant members have avatars? Who cares if theres Tits and Vaginas and Penises and Anuses, its what that person likes and if their avatar is that they will be percieved as a sick mother fucker Lol

@Ontopic Waste of Topic, should be locked you got your answer[/quote]

Because most people who are apart of this forum are under age this isn’t a porn site, if you want porn then go to R-S or other community that allows people to have it in their avatars and sigs…

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

People pretty much answered your questions, but I’ll go ahead and do it too:

  1. We don’t care about post count here, and believe it doesn’t matter. If you really want to see your post count, you can do so on your profile.
  2. We also don’t believe rep means all that much. Plus the system is set up in such a way that you give 1 rep point for every 15 points you have yourself, this means that, with a cap of 200, the most anyone can give is 13 points, which is a lot. If the cap is removed it would be possible for someone with thousands of rep to give someone else hundreds in just one click. So it would mean even less than it does now.
  3. Avatars and signatures make the forum look messy and childish, and are also a nightmare when it comes to moderation. We just don’t like them here.

What we DO think means a lot here is the quality (not quantity) of your posts, and how helpful you are to others. In fact, those are about the only things that matter.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:5, topic:377337”]1: No body should care
2: Rep is overrated, its just a number[/quote]

Its nice to have though isn’t it?

And the posts let you keep track easyer, if they could maybe

You selected what posts people may view on your profile and it could say:

Posts In: Server Help
345
Posts In: Server Downloads
231
Rep:
95

And you choose what people may view, max is 4. Or something.

Also why can’t we have avatars?

Read full topic

@Kaex wrote:

This still doesn’t case the post count. R - S does fine with it? and people can view profiles for post count so that doesn’t make sense, but I completely understand the rep issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

  1. Post count is looked upon as something that doesn’t matter. As seen with rep, it would only cause problems.

  2. It used to be that way until silabsoft passed a a few thousand I believe. Eventually it was just set to 200 to attempt to stop problems/uncontrollable rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Moparscape site
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

There isn’t one.

Ask away.

1 - People spam for post count.

2 - People rep their ‘friends’ or offer ‘rep4rep’ to get it higher, hence the reason you can’t rep others until you have a reputation of 15 or higher yourself.

No problem.

Read full topic
